Acchecchi，（chindati 的【過】），掙脫，割掉，毀滅。（p4）

acchecchi：acchecchi（kri）
အစ္ဆေစ္ဆိ（ကြိ）
chindati-.
ဆိန္ဒတိ-ကြည့်။
acchecchi：[aor. of chindati] broke away； cut out； destroyed.

Acchecchi，[Sk. acchaitsīt] 3rd sg. aor. of chindati “he has cut out or broken，has destroyed” （see also chindati 3），in combn. with taṇhaṁ M.I，122； S.I，12，23，127 （so read for acchejja）； IV，105，207. It.47； A.III，246，445； DhA.IV，70 （gloss acchindi，for acchidda pret. of Dh.351）. The v. l. at all passages is acchejji，which is to be accounted for on graphological grounds，ch & j being substituted in MSS. Kern （Toevoegselen s. v.） mistakes the form & tries to explain acchejji as adj. = ati-ejin （ejā），acchecchi = ati-icchin （icchā）. The syntactical construction however clearly points to an aor. （Page 9）
ACCHECCHI：（[aor] chindaṭi） đập bỏ，cắt bỏ，phá hủy bỏ

acchecchi：＂အစ္ဆေစ္ဆိ（ကြိ）

ဆိန္ဒတိ-ကြည့်။
